mapper.select: select * from tb_board where type = "free" order by topChk desc, no desc limit #{begin}, 10
select * from tb_board where (email like concat('%',#{searchText},'%')) and type = "free" order by no desc limit #{begin}, 10
select * from tb_board where (title like concat('%',#{searchText},'%')) and type = "free" order by no desc limit #{begin}, 10

select * from parcelboardfile where sum_path is not null order by no desc;
